description: Partnered with stakeholders to design AI-based auto-trading applications with Python that trades Futures Derivatives contracts, automating trade decisions and reducing manual oversight by 85%.
Directed a 3-member developer team to build a high-frequency trading bot achieving 133% returns in 30 days of forward testing while improving team productivity through Agile methodology.
Containerized the applications using Docker, running on AWS EC2 instances with Auto Scaling to ensure 24/7 uptime.
Optimized SQL queries (indexing, query refactoring) and Python algorithm, reducing latency by 78%.
Automated data collection using Flask, Lambda, and S3 buckets improving stakeholder transparency.
Developed an admin dashboard to monitor the applications running in the cloud.
